pr_title: Make Api Information task comment the diff on the PR

timeline.bodyText:
You can instead call
gradle.run('apiInformation', '--continue', check=False)
Also note the continue flag, it will make sure apiInformation runs for all sdks instead of stopping upon first failure.
timeline.author: vkryachko
